objects.name: ExitPopupText
objects.string:
Are you sure you want to quit the game?
You will be able to restart at any time.

content.text:
Are you sure you want to quit the game?
You will be able to restart at any time.

objects.name: WinPopupText
objects.string: "Thanks so much! That looks a lot better!"

content.text: "Thanks so much! That looks a lot better!"

objects.name: TutorialText
objects.string: Click or tap on the squares outlined in green to slide them into the blank space. Restore the photograph to win.

content.text: Click or tap on the squares outlined in green to slide them into the blank space. Restore the photograph to win.
